text: Bipin Karki (sometimes called Bhasme or Vashme; , born 21 August 1982) is a Nepalese actor. He is known as most versatile actor from Nepal. He is known for his role in Pashupati Prasad. == Selected filmography == * Pashupati Prasad * The Black Hen * Jatra * Naakaa * Loot 2 == References == == Other websites == * * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Nepalese movie actors
title: Bipin Karki
